title: Dia 2 Supp looking for Team
body:
Hey, General: Playing since S3 , Diamond 2 (had a break of 6months but i am back in shape for tournaments/teamranked ;)), Main Support !
 
!! Was ~#200{{champion:412}} world and #6 {{champion:201}} world !!! [before my break]

About me :
1. 16 years old but not flaming or blaming etc.
2. I am from Germany
3. I have alot of experience in LoL (Won many Tournaments with _** random**_ mates but looking for a serious team :))  
4. Shot caller if needed
5. Playstyle: Aggresive but i will always stick to the playstyle of my Adc if needed 

MFG iSparkle (called Madlife :P)
